title: This $30 Python and ChatGPT training bundle makes an awesome gift for techies
content:
Macworld

Know a coder who likes to stay on top of developments in the tech sphere? Then, the 2023 Ultimate AI ChatGPT and Python Programming Bundle would make a perfect gift. And since it’s been dropped in price for a limited time, now $29.97 (reg. $154) until November 9th, you can get it without putting excessive strain on your holiday budget.

This ChatGPT and Python bundle is an ideal resource for anyone interested in coding. Through 14 beginner-friendly courses and over 80 hours of lessons, students can learn how to code using Python 3, the basics of ChatGPT, how to code their own AI-powered chatbots for a wide range of use case scenarios, and more.

Check out some of the included courses:

  • Create a ChatGPT A.I. Bot with Django and Python
  • Python TkInter from Beginner to Winner
  • Python MTA 98-381: Complete Preparation Course
  • Robotics and Artificial Intelligence with Tools and Templates
  • And much more!

What makes this opportunity so special is that the courses are delivered by top e-learning instructors such as John Elder, Hugo Ferro, and Chris Mall (4.4-star rated!). Plus, all learning content is accessible online and available for life, meaning students can set their own training schedules and go at their own pace. 

This holiday season, give the gift of lifetime knowledge with The 2023 Ultimate AI ChatGPT and Python Programming Bundle, now just $29.97. No coupon is necessary, but this deal ends November 9th at 11:59pm Pacific!
